1.title: London
1.plot: 1888. Enter the glorious city of London, more than 50 years into the reign of Queen Victoria. Experience the hustle and bustle of this vibrant city (and touch upon its murky undertones!) in this unconventional tour to the heart of the British Empire.

2.title: Paris
2.plot: 1889. Promenade through the Belle Époque of Paris, a century after the French Revolution. Marvel at Paris's metropolitan culture, visit the World's Fair, and witness the impact of the French Revolution in this charming sojourn into golden age Paris.

3.title: New York
3.plot: 1893. Time travel to exciting New York and witness the industrial might of the Big Apple. The dawn of jaw-dropping skyscrapers and that iconic skyline are here in this 19th century snapshot of hectic New York life.

4.title: Washington DC
4.plot: 1893. Discover the grandeur of Washington DC, on America's rise to becoming one of the most powerful nations on Earth. Still yet a sleepy city, marvel at national treasures in this guide to the political centre of America.

5.title: Gettysburg
5.plot: 1873. Journey to the site of the most famous American Civil War battle, 10 years on. Relive important battles and decisive engagements in the Gettysburg environs, as we explore the cost of war, and what it means to fight for freedom.

6.title: Rome
6.plot: 1876. Visit illustrious Rome after the unification of Italy, and see the clash between imposing antiquities and the modern city. Discover the centre of the Catholic world with a tour around the Vatican, in this illuminating travel guide to the Italian capital.

imdb.plot outline: With vivid sounds, music and the magic of 3D, be transported to the past and discover the 19th century world in this fascinating new series. Time Traveller Guides 3D uses original, re-mastered Victorian stereographs, and extracts from travel guides of the time, to bring this bygone era to life.
imdb.title: Time Traveller Guides 3D
plot: With vivid sounds, music and the magic of 3D, be transported to the past and discover the 19th century world in this fascinating new series. _Time Traveller Guides 3D_ (qv) uses original, re-mastered Victorian stereographs, and extracts from travel guides of the time, to bring this bygone era to life.::Anonymous
